title: Lethal Company Free Hack
text:
I am glad to bring to your attention the first free hack for Lethal Company Steam PC, which you can download from this page. This is a simple solution for many players who want to simplify their gameplay. Using this free hack in the game Lethal Company you will be able to activate the cheat function ESP with which you will see players through the textures on the map, as well as objects, doors and more.
At the moment the cheat is in beta test and therefore there may be problems during launch and during the game. Keep an eye out for updates so you don't miss the current version of the hack.

Download and run SharpMonoInjector v2.5
Settings for the injector:
Namespace: LCHack
Class: Loader
Method: Init
Insert the LCHack_.dll file using SharpMonoInjector
Menu opens with INS(INSERT) or FN+INS.
Anubis Cheat Mod for Lethal Company
How to open rar, zip, 7-Zip cheat?
How to open .DLL cheat?
creator: P1st
